name: PRESC_ID
description: This table contains the prescription ID of an order that is populated by an interface.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the Order record for the prescription.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the prescription ID. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PRESC_ID
columns.description: The prescription ID of the order populated by an interface.
